hero.title: Building
hero.subtitle: Professional construction services with over 15 years of experience. Quality, reliability and precision in every project.

about.title: About
about.description1: BuildPro is a leading construction company based in Belgrade, dedicated to providing top-quality services in construction, renovation, and interior design.
about.description2: With a team of over 50 professionals and 15 years of experience, we have completed hundreds of projects of various sizes. Our mission is to execute every project with the highest quality standards.

services.title: Our
services.subtitle: We provide a wide range of construction services tailored to your needs

houseBuilding.title: House Construction
houseBuilding.desc: Complete construction process from foundation to roof. We use the highest quality materials and latest technologies.

renovation.title: Renovation
renovation.desc: Complete renovation of residential and commercial spaces. We transform your space according to your wishes.

interiorDesign.title: Interior Design
interiorDesign.desc: Creative solutions for interior decoration. Our design team creates functional and aesthetic spaces.

consulting.title: Consulting
consulting.desc: Expert advice for all phases of the project. We help you make the right decisions.

maintenance.title: Property Maintenance
maintenance.desc: Regular maintenance and emergency interventions. We are available 24/7 for your needs.

exterior.title: Exterior Work
exterior.desc: Facades, roofs, terraces and other exterior work. We protect your building from weather conditions.

projects.title: Featured
projects.subtitle: Check out some of our most successful projects

cta.title: Ready to start your project?
cta.subtitle: Contact us today and get a free consultation and cost estimate

footer.aboutText: Professional construction company with many years of experience in the implementation of residential and commercial buildings.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: We are ready to answer all your questions and help you with your project
